articles.title: Geminids meteor shower 2020: How to see best meteor shower of the year in the UK tonight - Daily Express
articles.description: GEMINIDS meteor shower will light up the UK skies tonight, with multi-colored shooting stars visible to the public throughout the night. This is how to watch the best meteor shower of the year from your own home, without the need for a telescope or binoculars.
